Question.Subject: Does Anyone Know What Formspring Is?
Question.Content:
i know it is a website tht u can ask questions on but is that all it does....
does anybody know??
im sorry if this is a dumb question but i have no idea :)
thnx...xxx
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I did type a longer answer out but due to Yahoo there was a 999 error making me unable to post it and losing it when I pressed back so...http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Formspring
But yes you can link it with Facebook and Twitter to get your social network friends to ask you anything and see what answer you come up with just for a bit of fun really between friends and family.
